text:
Anushka Sharma Leaves For Australia To Celebrate Her First Wedding Anniversary With Hubby Virat Kohli
Anushka Sharma Leaves For Australia To Celebrate Her First Wedding Anniversary With Hubby Virat Kohli
Well, it just looks like yesterday when Anushka Sharma walked the aisle with Virat Kohli looking nothing less than a princess.
The most beautiful couple tied the knot on December 11 last year and soon they will be celebrating their first anniversary.
Twitter
The Indian cricket team captain Virat is in Australia playing his game, his wifey will soon join him and the couple will celebrate their most special day together. Anushka was even spotted at the airport leaving the town by the paps, the actress looked elated as she was soon going to meet her hubby.
Don't Miss 3.5 K SHARES 518 SHARES 235 SHARES
Twitter
Twitter
On the professional front, Anushka’s next release is Zero and she has done her promotions and now left for a holiday with hubby.
Anushka and Virat give us major couple goals as they have mastered the art of balancing their work and personal life.
title: Anushka Sharma Leaves For Australia To Celebrate Her First Wedding Anniversary With Hubby Virat Kohli
